title: John Dory, mousseron mushrooms, broad beans and wild strawberries
description: Wild strawberries are smaller and have a more intense flavour than regular ones, if they grow freely in your garden this is a lovely way to serve them.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, squashed and left whole
Lemon balm cress, lambs lettuce cress, bergamot cress, apple blossom cress, to garnish
